characters.story: The door takes the shape of fan, shouting "Shahn!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents can't help but, shouting "Nigh!" sharply!
Like a shellfish, this character means funds and whispers "Kwahn"!
"Sway!" Altar mountain commanded sharply - evil spirit, demon malevolent cultivators must exorcise!
"Joo!" Altar brother commanded sharply - wish well, bless and congratulate!
"Shyahng, is it auspicious?" Altar piggy bank questioned propitious curiously - lucky and fortunate!
Picture confidential taking form - it shouts "Mee!" with vivid energy!
The heart takes the shape of console, shouting "Way!" sharply!
Picture luxuriant taking form - it shouts "Way!" with vivid energy!

The tree takes the shape of palm tree, singing "Dzohng!" cheerfully!
An striking symbol for universe that shouts "Joh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
An striking symbol for axle that asks "Joh? Pivot?" curiously!
A striking symbol for sleeve that shouts "Shyo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for flute that asks "Dee? Whistle?" curiously!
Picture earth beside soil: that's female, singing "Kwun!" cheerfully!
The mouth stands for groan, singing "Shun!" cheerfully spoken through parted lips!

See how the fire forms partnership? It whispers "Hwoh" softly!
